title: How to Get to the Heart of Your Teen: A Guide for Parents and Teens
description: Comments from Readers "All of us, as parents, want to learn the best skills possible to parent our young children and teenagers and to truly get to the heart of our child. We often don't know how to teach our kids * to understand the value of work* to develop appropriate social skills* to accept themselves for who they are* to grow closer to their Heavenly Father through prayer* to choose and develop good habits* to come to believe and trust in God through scripture study* to be empathetic to others and to not bully or tease their peers* to take care of their bodies through proper diet and exercise* to set goals and work toward achieving them and* to make wise dating choices We often worry and do nothing, although we know how important it is to teach our children. With these struggles in mind, Lisa Brereton addresses ten of the most common parenting questions people face today. She takes away our fear of involvement by helping us to understand what our children are going through at different stages in their lives and provides us with practical hands-on ideas for teaching our children. In a superb way she helps us truly meet heart-toheart with our children." Pat GarciaMarriage and Family TherapistJr. High Counselor
author: Lisa R. Brereton
